Text:
You have the same photo for a half dozen torrents.

How about using a photo that's representative of the photos in the set, and not just the model.

It's just because it takes time. You can easy download only 1 pics from each set in the torrent if you like, cus they are not compressed. 

But maybe I do that if I find a fast way to do it. Can upload one pic from each set and have a link in the torrent. Easier.
